alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 11 at 6:26PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, eastern Alachua, northwestern Putnam and southwestern Clay Counties through 700 PM EST... At 626 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Cross Creek, or 8 miles west of Citra, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Keystone Heights, Melrose, Hawthorne, Lake Geneva, Rochelle, Melrose Landing, Cross Creek, Orange Heights, Newnans Lake and Waldo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam
